Style/YodaCondition.description:
Description

Forbid or enforce yoda conditions.
Style/YodaCondition.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

References: ['https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yoda_conditions'] (type: list)
EnforcedStyle: forbid_for_all_comparison_operators (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['forbid_for_all_comparison_operators', 'forbid_for_equality_operators_only', 'require_for_all_comparison_operators', 'require_for_equality_operators_only'] (type: list)
